title: Shobhikhan_007
author: Shobhikhan_007
content: What you guys already invest or looking to invest in 2023 instead of cryptocurrency?. I already brought 24K Gold biscuts.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Mine would be anything that's good and related to my role in life. Basically things that are mobile and can easily be moved around to different places. Currently invested in mobile farming that produces foods all year round.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Bitcoin is the best investment you can make for the next 30-40 years in my opinion. There are some traditional investments that are a good option for a diversified portfolio. You can buy stocks, I specifically like managed funds like the S&P500. Historically it’s done very well.I don’t really like precious metals to be honest but each to their own. Do your own research before investing in anything obviously.

comments.body: Mostly in shares and equity funds and also som real estates. I'm really a newbie at cryptocurrencies. I have just bought a couple of Ledger Nano S and Trezor One hardware wallets but I haven't bought any cryptocurrency yet. I'm still learning.

comments.author: violastan2
comments.body: it's worth noting that investment decisions should be based on individual financial goals, risk tolerance, and research. Some common alternative investments to cryptocurrencies include stocks, bonds, real estate, and commodities. It's important to diversify one's portfolio and to consult with a financial advisor before making any investment decisions.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: To be honest I don’t like to invest in much other than crypto if I am honest. This is a shot out of left field but it is good to invest on ourselves & by that i mean look after ourselves. We should eat well, spend quality time with family, do things we enjoy. Try to relax when not at work.If we are talking strictly about physical things to invest in that aren’t crypto then real estate is good, you rarely lose money over time on real estate.
